Character

角色类, 属性设定均由构造函数完成，不存在后续修改

对局类, 创建需要导入 SurTeam 和 HunTeam 两支队伍以及对局进度

赛后数据窗口文本设置

MapV2

A base class for observable objects that also acts as recipients for messages. This class is an extension of CommunityToolkit.Mvvm.ComponentModel.ObservableObject which also provides built-in support to use the CommunityToolkit.Mvvm.Messaging.IMessenger type.

Member

选手类, 注意与 Player 类做区分，这是表示上场的选手，本类是表示队伍内的成员, Member 被它所操纵的 Player 包含

Player

选手类, 注意与 Member 类做区分，这是表示队伍内的成员，本类是表示上场的选手, Player 类包含操纵它的 Member

PlayerData

赛后数据类，用于存储赛后数据

Score

比分类, 用于展示比分

ScoreWindowSettings

比分窗口设置

ScoreWindowTextSettings

分数窗口文本设置

Settings

A base class for objects of which the properties must be observable.

Talent

A base class for objects of which the properties must be observable.

Team

队伍类, SharedDataService 中主队和客队对应的对象全场始终不变，信息导入依靠 ImportTeamInfo(Team) 方法

TextSettings

文本设置

Trait

天赋类, 属性设定均由构造函数完成，不存在后续修改
